title: Democracy Now! 2022-10-25 Tuesday
description:
China’s President Xi Jinping begins a historic third term after eliminating term limits; With midterms two weeks away, legendary consumer advocate and former presidential candidate Ralph Nader campaigns for Democrats for the first time ever, and political organizer Mark Green says the Democratic party needs to be more aggressive in its message against the GOP.

Get Democracy Now! delivered right to your inbox. Sign up for the Daily Digest: democracynow.org/subscribe

content:encoded:
Democracy Now! 2022-10-25 Tuesday

  • Headlines for October 25, 2022
  • China Under Xi Jinping: From Human Rights Concerns to "Inter-Capitalist Competition" with U.S.
  • Ralph Nader Throws Support to Democrats Ahead of Midterms But Warns the Party's Message Is Failing
